title: Introducing: Leave the Planet
content:
I’m a little late to this one, but boy am I glad I’ve found Leave the Planet.

 With only two tracks online, this London duo (Nathalia Bruno and Jack Milwaukee) create brooding and dark soundscapes with a hazy and washed out production that I can’t help but fall for. Between Bodies is a startling good effort, the guitars perched subtly above the gritty electronic landscape below. It really is a mesmerising sound.

(Thanks to The Undscvrd for putting me onto these guys).
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
